# GLFW
add_subdirectory(GLFW)

# Glad
add_subdirectory(glad)

# EnTT (header-only)
add_library(entt INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(entt INTERFACE
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/entt/include()
)

# spdlog
add_subdirectory(spdlog)


# stb (header-only)
add_library(stb INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(stb INTERFACE
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/stb
)


# ImGui 核心源文件
set(IMGUI_SRC
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui/imgui.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui/imgui_demo.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui/imgui_draw.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui/imgui_tables.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui/imgui_widgets.cpp
)

# 后端开关
option(IMGUI_BACKEND_GLFW_OPENGL3 "Enable ImGui GLFW+OpenGL3 backend" ON)
option(IMGUI_BACKEND_DX12         "Enable ImGui DirectX12 backend"   OFF)
option(IMGUI_BACKEND_VULKAN       "Enable ImGui Vulkan backend"      OFF)

if(IMGUI_BACKEND_GLFW_OPENGL3)
    list(APPEND IMGUI_SRC
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui/backends/imgui_impl_glfw.cpp
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui/backends/imgui_impl_opengl3.cpp
    )
endif()

if(IMGUI_BACKEND_DX12)
    list(APPEND IMGUI_SRC
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui/backends/imgui_impl_win32.cpp
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui/backends/imgui_impl_dx12.cpp
    )
endif()

if(IMGUI_BACKEND_VULKAN)
    list(APPEND IMGUI_SRC
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui/backends/imgui_impl_glfw.cpp
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui/backends/imgui_impl_vulkan.cpp
    )
endif()

# 定义 imgui 静态库
add_library(imgui ${IMGUI_SRC})

# 包含路径（始终添加 core/backends，方便 #include "imgui.h"）
target_include_directories(imgui PUBLIC
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/imgui/backends
)


# 添加 GLFW 依赖
if(IMGUI_BACKEND_GLFW_OPENGL3 OR IMGUI_BACKEND_VULKAN)
    target_link_libraries(imgui PUBLIC glfw)
    # 如果 GLFW 的头文件路径不在标准位置，可以显式添加
    target_include_directories(imgui PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/GLFW/include)
endif()
